componentDescription: Creates beautiful gradient backgrounds with various styles and animations.

type.description: Specifies the type of gradient to render.

direction.description: Specifies the direction for linear gradients.

shape.description: Specifies the shape for radial gradients.

position.description: Specifies the position for radial and conic gradients.

from.description: Specifies the start color for simple two-color gradients.

to.description: Specifies the end color for simple two-color gradients.

colors.description: Specifies an array of color stops for multi-color gradients.

animationDuration.description: Specifies the duration of the animation in seconds.

children.description: Content to render inside the gradient.

views.description: Custom styling that overrides default views.
